mapper.select: SELECT MEM_CODE "MEMCODE" , PI_ID "PIID" , PI_NICKNAME "NICKNAME" , JOB_NAME "JOBNAME" , PI_SELF_INTRO "INTRO" FROM MEMBER M JOIN PERSONAL_INFO PI ON M.MEM_CODE = PI.PI_MEM_CODE JOIN JOB J ON M.MEM_JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE WHERE M.MEM_CODE = #{memCode}
SELECT MEM_CODE "MEMCODE" , SK_CODE "SKCODE" , SK_NAME "SKNAME" FROM MEMBER M JOIN MY_SKILL MS ON M.MEM_CODE = MS.MS_MEM_CODE JOIN SKILL SK ON SK.SK_CODE = MS.MS_SK_CODE WHERE M.MEM_CODE = #{memCode}

SELECT DISTINCT OP_CODE "OPCODE" , OP_TITLE "TITLE" , OP_CONTENT "CONTENT" , OP_TEAM_NAME "TEAMNAME" FROM PERSONAL_INFO PI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON PI.PI_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON M.MEM_CODE = PA.PA_MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN PART_CHECK PC ON PA.PA_NO = PC.PC_PA_NO LEFT JOIN TEAM_JOB TJ ON PA.PA_TJ_NO = TJ.TJ_NO LEFT JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON TJ.TJ_OP_CODE = OP.OP_CODE WHERE OP.OP_CODE IN ( SELECT DISTINCT OP_CODE FROM VIEW_END_PROJECT WHERE OU_1 > 0 AND OU_2 > 0 AND OU_4 > 0 AND OU_11 > 0 AND OU_12 > 0 AND OU_13 > 0 AND OU_14 > 0 GROUP BY OP_CODE ) AND M.MEM_CODE = #{memCode}
